sentences: Sageli me ei anna endale aru, kuidas meie sõnad teistele mõjuda võivad.
Alles nüüd annan endale selgemini aru, kus ma õieti viibin.
Ta ei saanud endale selgust probleemist.
context: Endale is an Estonian pronoun in the allative case form of 'enda' (oneself). It indicates direction or motion toward oneself, often used with verbs of understanding, giving, or reaching clarity. The word commonly appears in expressions related to self-understanding, like 'endale aru andma' (to give oneself understanding) which means to realize or comprehend something.
